channel.title: Can you please help me with range?
channel.description:
How come when i use a magic shortbow and rune arrows, it will hit damage on players, but when i attack npcs, ill just face the npc but not do anything(shoot arrows or hit damage)??? can someone please tell me what i should do? thanks!
ok i figured out the problem.. i wont hit damage on the npc unless, im right up to his face (touching him) how do i make it so that i dont have to be touching him to hit damage on him with range?

item.title: Can you please help me with range?
item.dc:creator: @snowycards snowycards
item.description:
@snowycards wrote:

now can someone help me?

Read full topic

item.title: Can you please help me with range?
item.dc:creator: @kniveslives kniveslives
item.description:
@kniveslives wrote:

xx qwertyuiop xx:

He doesn’t need help, he’s just too lazy to do it himself so he bothers other people.

Exactly, they need to look for a tutorial, or a previously answered topic of the same question, what I normally do is I download another source that has the same thing working properly and see how that person did it, instead of pissing everyone on here off with questions.

I’m obviously not the one that needs to grow up, I’m not spamming my questions on the forums, please don’t act like you know me.

Read full topic
